color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，默认为 theme.primaryColor

icon.description: Blockquote icon, displayed on the top left
icon.description_zh: 块引用图标，显示在左上角

iconSize.description: Controls icon width and height, numbers are converted to rem, 40 by default
iconSize.description_zh: 控制图标的宽度和高度，数字转换为 rem，默认为 40

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何用于设置 border-radius 的任何有效 CSS 值，默认为 theme.defaultRadius
